title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired features, user experience, and technical specifications for the virtual prototyping environment.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the virtual reality engine, user interface, data management, and integration with existing design tools.

title: Develop Virtual Reality Engine
description: Implement the virtual reality engine responsible for rendering and simulating the immersive environment.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the virtual prototyping environment, including tools for creating and manipulating product designs.

title: Implement Data Management
description: Develop the data management system for storing and retrieving product designs, user data, and other relevant information.

title: Integrate with Existing Design Tools
description: Develop interfaces and integrations to allow seamless import and export of product designs from existing CAD and design tools.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop security measures and access controls to ensure the protection of sensitive data and intellectual property within the virtual prototyping environment.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Configure the development and testing environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the quality and reliability of the virtual prototyping environment, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop user manuals, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the virtual prototyping environment.
